      • getSampleDateTime

        public static java.util.Date getSampleDateTime()
        Return sample date, that can be used to determine preferred string width.

        We should not use new Date() to ensure results are reproducible (and to avoid "Today" for pretty formats). Returned date is expected to return maximum width string for date formats like "d.m.yy H:M".
